summary: Follow-up investigation confirmed documentation vs implementation gap. Agent definitions describe phase status updates in natural language but provide no concrete Edit tool examples. Skills only update plan HEADER status via sed, not individual PHASE markers. This explains why phases go directly from [NOT STARTED] to [PARTIAL] without intermediate [IN PROGRESS].

artifacts.summary: Follow-up investigation revealing documentation vs implementation gap for phase status updates

next_steps: Update implementation plan to add concrete Edit tool examples to agent definitions

metadata.key_finding: Natural language instructions exist but no concrete Edit tool invocation examples
